title: HTML
subTitle: Structuring web applications with standards and SEO in mind
overviewContent: Expertly structure web applications using HTML with careful attention to semantic elements, meta tags, and W3C standards to ensure accessibility, maintainability, and SEO optimisation. Applied HTML best practices to deliver responsive, high-performance pages while supporting front-end frameworks and collaborating with UI/UX designers. Focused on precise implementation of tags to improve search engine ranking and enhance user experience across devices.
